snippet: The Republican leaders of a drive to oust the State Assembly Speaker, a fellow Republican, said today that they had collected enough signatures to request a recall election.   With Democratic support, Doris Allen became the Assembly's first female...
lead_paragraph: The Republican leaders of a drive to oust the State Assembly Speaker, a fellow Republican, said today that they had collected enough signatures to request a recall election. With Democratic support, Doris Allen became the Assembly's first female Speaker in June, infuriating the Republican establishment by making a deal with Assemblyman Willie L. Brown Jr., the Democrat whom she succeeded.

headline.main: California Speaker Focus of Recall Push
